languages.text:
Using Overcharge attacks with plasma weapons has {uip|Chance|0835dbc012334dd49f849fcc92e9f708}% (max 100) chance of causing {g|f:2a5d173c50af4cfd86eb00b12848b450}Plasma Explosion{/g}.
Each stack increases damage of Overcharge (Area Attack) by +5%, Overcharge (Extra Damage) by +15% and {g|f:2a5d173c50af4cfd86eb00b12848b450}Plasma Explosion{/g} by 10%.
Lose 1 stack at the start of your main turn.

traits.locale_text:
Using Overcharge attacks with plasma weapons has {uip|Chance|0835dbc012334dd49f849fcc92e9f708}% (max 100) chance of causing {g|f:2a5d173c50af4cfd86eb00b12848b450}Plasma Explosion{/g}.
Each stack increases damage of Overcharge (Area Attack) by +5%, Overcharge (Extra Damage) by +15% and {g|f:2a5d173c50af4cfd86eb00b12848b450}Plasma Explosion{/g} by 10%.
Lose 1 stack at the start of your main turn.

languages.text:
Using overcharge attack with a plasma weapon gains {uip|Chance|0835dbc012334dd49f849fcc92e9f708}% chance (cannot be more than 100%) of causing {g|f:2a5d173c50af4cfd86eb00b12848b450}Plasma Explosion{/g}.
Each stack of this effect increases the damage of {g|f:0bc1f945b05e4b5593ec6151c7109a06}Plasma Overcharge (Area Attack){/g} by +5%, {g|f:1da644efeb174a789fc857602ebdfc1b}Plasma Overcharge (Extra Damage){/g} by +15%, and {g|f:2a5d173c50af4cfd86eb00b12848b450}Plasma Explosion{/g} by +10%.
At the start of the wielder's non-{g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g}, −1 stack of this effect is removed.

languages.text:
Атака перегретым плазменным оружием имеет шанс {uip|Chance|0835dbc012334dd49f849fcc92e9f708}% (не выше 100%) вызвать {g|f:2a5d173c50af4cfd86eb00b12848b450}Взрыв плазмы{/g}.
Каждый уровень этого эффекта увеличивает урон {g|f:0bc1f945b05e4b5593ec6151c7109a06}Перегрева плазмы (атаки по области){/g} на 5%, {g|f:1da644efeb174a789fc857602ebdfc1b}Перегрева плазмы (дополнительного урона){/g} на 15% и{g|f:2a5d173c50af4cfd86eb00b12848b450}Взрыва плазмы{/g} на 10%.
В начале каждого не {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}дополнительного{/g} хода персонажа 1 уровень этого эффекта снимается.

Каждый уровень этого эффекта увеличивает урон {g|f:0bc1f945b05e4b5593ec6151c7109a06}Перегрева плазмы (атаки по области){/g} на 5%, {g|f:1da644efeb174a789fc857602ebdfc1b}Перегрева плазмы (дополнительного урона){/g} на 15% и{g|f:2a5d173c50af4cfd86eb00b12848b450}Взрыва плазмы{/g} на 10%.
В начале каждого не {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}дополнительного{/g} хода персонажа 1 уровень этого эффекта снимается.

languages.text: プラズマ武器のオーバーチャージ攻撃すると、{g|f:2a5d173c50af4cfd86eb00b12848b450}プラズマ爆発{/g}の {uip|Chance|0835dbc012334dd49f849fcc92e9f708}％チャンスを得る（最大値は100%）。1スタックにつき、{g|f:0bc1f945b05e4b5593ec6151c7109a06}プラズマオーバーチャージ（範囲攻撃）{/g}のダメージが５％、{g|f:1da644efeb174a789fc857602ebdfc1b}プラズマオーバーチャージ（追加ダメージ）{/g}ダメージが１５％、{g|f:2a5d173c50af4cfd86eb00b12848b450}プラズマ爆発{/g}のダメージが１０％に増加する。使用者の{g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}不追加ターン{/g}の最初で、この効果の1スタックが解除される。
languages.original_text:
Using overcharge attack with a plasma weapon gains {uip|Chance|0835dbc012334dd49f849fcc92e9f708}% chance (cannot be more than 100%) of causing {g|f:2a5d173c50af4cfd86eb00b12848b450}Plasma Explosion{/g}.
Each stack of this effect increases damage of {g|f:0bc1f945b05e4b5593ec6151c7109a06}Plasma Overcharge (Area Attack){/g} by +5%, {g|f:1da644efeb174a789fc857602ebdfc1b}Plasma Overcharge (Extra Damage){/g} by +15%, and {g|f:2a5d173c50af4cfd86eb00b12848b450}Plasma Explosion{/g} by 10%.
At the start of the wielder's non-{g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g}, −1 stack of this effect is removed.

traits.locale_text: プラズマ武器のオーバーチャージ攻撃すると、{g|f:2a5d173c50af4cfd86eb00b12848b450}プラズマ爆発{/g}の {uip|Chance|0835dbc012334dd49f849fcc92e9f708}％チャンスを得る（最大値は100%）。1スタックにつき、{g|f:0bc1f945b05e4b5593ec6151c7109a06}プラズマオーバーチャージ（範囲攻撃）{/g}のダメージが５％、{g|f:1da644efeb174a789fc857602ebdfc1b}プラズマオーバーチャージ（追加ダメージ）{/g}ダメージが１５％、{g|f:2a5d173c50af4cfd86eb00b12848b450}プラズマ爆発{/g}のダメージが１０％に増加する。使用者の{g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}不追加ターン{/g}の最初で、この効果の1スタックが解除される。

languages.text:
Ein überladener Angriff mit einer Plasmawaffe hat eine Chance von {uip|Chance|0835dbc012334dd49f849fcc92e9f708} % (max. 100 %), eine {g|f:2a5d173c50af4cfd86eb00b12848b450}Plasma-Explosion{/g} zu verursachen.
Jeder Stapel dieses Effektes erhöht den Schaden durch {g|f:0bc1f945b05e4b5593ec6151c7109a06}Plasma-Überladung (Flächenangriff){/g} um +5 %, den Schaden durch {g|f:1da644efeb174a789fc857602ebdfc1b}Plasma-Überladung (Zusatzschaden){/g} um +15 %, und den Schaden durch {g|f:2a5d173c50af4cfd86eb00b12848b450}Plasma-Explosion{/g} um +10 %.
Zu Beginn des Nicht-{g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}Zusatzzuges{/g} des Trägers wird −1 Stapel dieses Effektes entfernt.
languages.original_text:
Using overcharge attack with a plasma weapon gains {uip|Chance|0835dbc012334dd49f849fcc92e9f708}% chance (cannot be more than 100%) of causing {g|f:2a5d173c50af4cfd86eb00b12848b450}Plasma Explosion{/g}.
Each stack of this effect increases the damage of {g|f:0bc1f945b05e4b5593ec6151c7109a06}Plasma Overcharge (Area Attack){/g} by +5%, {g|f:1da644efeb174a789fc857602ebdfc1b}Plasma Overcharge (Extra Damage){/g} by +15%, and {g|f:2a5d173c50af4cfd86eb00b12848b450}Plasma Explosion{/g} by +10%.

traits.locale_text:
Ein überladener Angriff mit einer Plasmawaffe hat eine Chance von {uip|Chance|0835dbc012334dd49f849fcc92e9f708} % (max. 100 %), eine {g|f:2a5d173c50af4cfd86eb00b12848b450}Plasma-Explosion{/g} zu verursachen.
Jeder Stapel dieses Effektes erhöht den Schaden durch {g|f:0bc1f945b05e4b5593ec6151c7109a06}Plasma-Überladung (Flächenangriff){/g} um +5 %, den Schaden durch {g|f:1da644efeb174a789fc857602ebdfc1b}Plasma-Überladung (Zusatzschaden){/g} um +15 %, und den Schaden durch {g|f:2a5d173c50af4cfd86eb00b12848b450}Plasma-Explosion{/g} um +10 %.
Zu Beginn des Nicht-{g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}Zusatzzuges{/g} des Trägers wird −1 Stapel dieses Effektes entfernt.

languages.text:
Usar el ataque de sobrecarga con un arma de plasma gana una probabilidad del {uip|Chance|0835dbc012334dd49f849fcc92e9f708} % (máximo del 100 %) de causar una {g|f:2a5d173c50af4cfd86eb00b12848b450}Explosión de plasma{/g}.
Cada acumulación de este efecto aumenta el daño de {g|f:0bc1f945b05e4b5593ec6151c7109a06}Sobrecarga de plasma (ataque de área){/g} en un +5 %, el de {g|f:1da644efeb174a789fc857602ebdfc1b}Sobrecarga de plasma (daño adicional){/g} en un +15 % y el de {g|f:2a5d173c50af4cfd86eb00b12848b450}Explosión de plasma{/g} en un +10 %.
Al principio de cada {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}turno no extra{/g} del portador, se elimina −1 acumulación del efecto.
languages.original_text:
Using overcharge attack with a plasma weapon gains {uip|Chance|0835dbc012334dd49f849fcc92e9f708}% chance (cannot be more than 100%) of causing {g|f:2a5d173c50af4cfd86eb00b12848b450}Plasma Explosion{/g}.
Each stack of this effect increases the damage of {g|f:0bc1f945b05e4b5593ec6151c7109a06}Plasma Overcharge (Area Attack){/g} by +5%, {g|f:1da644efeb174a789fc857602ebdfc1b}Plasma Overcharge (Extra Damage){/g} by +15%, and {g|f:2a5d173c50af4cfd86eb00b12848b450}Plasma Explosion{/g} by +10%.

Usar el ataque de sobrecarga con un arma de plasma gana una probabilidad del {uip|Chance|0835dbc012334dd49f849fcc92e9f708} % (máximo del 100 %) de causar una {g|f:2a5d173c50af4cfd86eb00b12848b450}Explosión de plasma{/g}.

Al principio de cada {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}turno no extra{/g} del portador, se elimina −1 acumulación del efecto.

languages.text:
使用等离子武器的过度充能攻击时，有{uip|Chance|0835dbc012334dd49f849fcc92e9f708}%几率（最高不超过100%）触发{g|f:2a5d173c50af4cfd86eb00b12848b450}等离子爆炸{/g}。
每有1层此效果，{g|f:0bc1f945b05e4b5593ec6151c7109a06}等离子过载（范围攻击）{/g}造成的伤害提高5%，{g|f:1da644efeb174a789fc857602ebdfc1b}等离子过载（额外伤害）{/g}造成的伤害提高15%，{g|f:2a5d173c50af4cfd86eb00b12848b450}等离子爆炸{/g}造成的伤害提高10%。
装备者的非{g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}额外回合{/g}开始时，失去1层此效果。

Using overcharge attack with a plasma weapon gains {uip|Chance|0835dbc012334dd49f849fcc92e9f708}% chance (cannot be more than 100%) of causing {g|f:2a5d173c50af4cfd86eb00b12848b450}Plasma Explosion{/g}.
Each stack of this effect increases the damage of {g|f:0bc1f945b05e4b5593ec6151c7109a06}Plasma Overcharge (Area Attack){/g} by +5%, {g|f:1da644efeb174a789fc857602ebdfc1b}Plasma Overcharge (Extra Damage){/g} by +15%, and {g|f:2a5d173c50af4cfd86eb00b12848b450}Plasma Explosion{/g} by +10%.

languages.text:
Porter une attaque en mode Surcharge avec une arme à plasma confère {uip|Chance|0835dbc012334dd49f849fcc92e9f708} % de chances (maximum 100 %) de provoquer une {g|f:2a5d173c50af4cfd86eb00b12848b450}Explosion de plasma{/g}.
Chaque cumul de cet effet augmente les dégâts de {g|f:0bc1f945b05e4b5593ec6151c7109a06}Surcharge de plasma (attaque de zone){/g} de +5 %, ceux de {g|f:1da644efeb174a789fc857602ebdfc1b}Surcharge de plasma (dégâts supplémentaires){/g} de +15 % et ceux d'{g|f:2a5d173c50af4cfd86eb00b12848b450}Explosion de plasma{/g} de +10 %.
Au début du tour de l'utilisateur, hors {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}tours supplémentaires{/g}, −1 cumul de cet effet est supprimé.
languages.original_text:
Using overcharge attack with a plasma weapon gains {uip|Chance|0835dbc012334dd49f849fcc92e9f708}% chance (cannot be more than 100%) of causing {g|f:2a5d173c50af4cfd86eb00b12848b450}Plasma Explosion{/g}.
Each stack of this effect increases the damage of {g|f:0bc1f945b05e4b5593ec6151c7109a06}Plasma Overcharge (Area Attack){/g} by +5%, {g|f:1da644efeb174a789fc857602ebdfc1b}Plasma Overcharge (Extra Damage){/g} by +15%, and {g|f:2a5d173c50af4cfd86eb00b12848b450}Plasma Explosion{/g} by +10%.

languages.text:
Plazma silahıyla aşırı yükleme saldırısı yapmak, %{uip|Chance|0835dbc012334dd49f849fcc92e9f708} {g|f:2a5d173c50af4cfd86eb00b12848b450}Plazma Patlaması'na{/g} sebep olma olasılığı (%100'dan fazla olamaz) kazandırır.
Bu etkinin her bir birikimi; {g|f:0bc1f945b05e4b5593ec6151c7109a06}Aşırı Plazma Yükleme (Alan Saldırısı){/g} tarafından verilen hasarı +%5, {g|f:1da644efeb174a789fc857602ebdfc1b}Aşırı Plazma Yükleme (Ek Hasar){/g} tarafından verilen hasarı +%15 ve {g|f:2a5d173c50af4cfd86eb00b12848b450}Plazma Patlaması{/g} tarafından verilen hasarı +%10 artırır.
Kullanan kişinin {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}ek tur{/g} olmayan turunun başlangıcında bu etkinin 1 birikimi ortadan kalkar.
languages.original_text:
Using overcharge attack with a plasma weapon gains {uip|Chance|0835dbc012334dd49f849fcc92e9f708}% chance (cannot be more than 100%) of causing {g|f:2a5d173c50af4cfd86eb00b12848b450}Plasma Explosion{/g}.
Each stack of this effect increases the damage of {g|f:0bc1f945b05e4b5593ec6151c7109a06}Plasma Overcharge (Area Attack){/g} by +5%, {g|f:1da644efeb174a789fc857602ebdfc1b}Plasma Overcharge (Extra Damage){/g} by +15%, and {g|f:2a5d173c50af4cfd86eb00b12848b450}Plasma Explosion{/g} by +10%.
